briefTitle: A Placebo-Controlled, Phase 3 Study of Relugolix (TAK-385) 40 mg in the Treatment of Pain Symptoms Associated With Uterine Fibroids
officialTitle: A Multicenter, Randomized, Double-Blind, Parallel-Group, Placebo-Controlled, Phase 3 Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Oral TAK-385 40 mg in the Treatment of Pain Symptoms Associated With Uterine Fibroids
summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy and safety of Relugolix (TAK-385) in patients having pain symptoms associated with uterine fibroids.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With a Maximum NRS Score of 1 or Less During the 28 Days Before the Final Dose of Study Drug
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: For 28 days before the final dose of study drug (up to Week 12)
